bio: Fjona’s Familiar is the summoned ghost of Fjona. He protected Fjona when she was a young girl. Fjona is now an adult, and she travels around Skyrim as a hunter and a bard. Fjona doesn't need her familiar to protect her anymore, and he now lives a lonely existence within an abandoned half-flooded prison hidden in the remote wildnerness of Eastmarch.
name: Fjona’s Familiar
